Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-GHb (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 61.5% similarity toTemporin-GHa. molecular formula: C73H107N19O14; Mol Wt: 1474.775; GRAVY = 1.4.Activity: Active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 43300 MRSA or ATCC 25923 (MIC 6.8-26.4 uM);  B. subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC 52.9 uM); Gram- E. coli ATCC 25922 or D31 (MIC 6.8-26.4 uM); V. alginolyticus IS (MIC 13.2 uM);  P. aeruginosa ATCC 15442 (MIC 26.4 uM); and C. albicans ATCC 10231 (MIC 26.4 uM). Provided by Yingxia Zhang. Updated Jan2020; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Dong Z, Luo W, Zhong H, Wang M, Song Y, Deng S, Zhang Y.2017, China, Asia
Literature Information.Reference: Acta Biochim Biophys Sin (Shanghai). 2017 May 1;49(5):450-457. doi: 10.1093/abbs/gmx023.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Molecular cloning and characterization of antimicrobial peptides from skin of Hylarana guentheri.
